<img src="http://eums.eusa.ed.ac.uk/wp-content/uploads/images/w620/posters/20120518_summer.jpg" alt="" width="620" height="441" /></a>

The Edinburgh University Music Society's famous Summer Concert takes place on Friday the 18th, where we showcase all three of our ensembles under the same roof.</p>

This year we will be performing no fewer than six pieces, ranging from Britten's Rejoice In The Lamb</em> to Sibelius' stunning Symphony No. 5</em>.</p>

The EPIC programme for the night will be:</p>

Schubert </strong></strong>Alfonso Und Estrella Overture</p>

Delius </strong></strong>Walk To The Paradise Garden</p>

Tchaikovsky </strong></strong>Polonaise from Eugene Onegin</p>

Britten </strong></strong>Rejoice In The Lamb</p>

Lauridsen </strong></strong>Sure On This Shining Light</p>

Sibelius </strong></strong>Symphony No. 5</p>

Doors open at 7pm, and it is recommended that you arrive early to ensure that you are not disappointed!</p>

To buy tickets, click the link below:</p>
